articles.title: Spokesman for Foreign Ministry Clarifies Stand on S. Korea's Projected Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Spokesman for Foreign Ministry Clarifies Stand on S. Korea's Projected Satellite Launch
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Monday gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA as regards foreign press reports that south Korea would launch a satellite soon:
					It was reported that south Korea would launch a satellite soon with the technical cooperation from Russia.
					
					 Four months ago parties to the six-party talks brought up the DPRK's satellite launch for a scientific purpose to the United Nations Security Council for discussion and "denounced" it and applied "sanctions" against it. 
					
					 This resulted in violating the principle of respect for sovereignty and equality, the life and soul and basis of the talks, and bringing them to an end. 
					
					 We will closely watch if the above-said parties will also refer south Korea's satellite launch to the UNSC.
					
					 Their reaction and attitude towards south Korea's satellite launch will once again clearly prove whether the principle of equality exists or has collapsed.

articles.title: Chairperson of Hyundai Group of S. Korea Here
articles.content:
Chairperson of Hyundai Group of S. Korea Here
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Hyon Jong Un, chairperson of the Hyundai Group of south Korea and her party arrived here on Monday via Kaesong at the invitation of the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee.
					 They were met by Ri Jong Hyok, vice-chairman of the said committee, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Chinese Women's Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Chinese Women's Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the All-China Women's Federation led by Vice-President Zhen Yan, arrived here by air today.

articles.title: Well-received Carpets
articles.content:
Well-received Carpets
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Products of the Pyongyang Carpet Factory are drawing interests of many people at home and abroad.
					 The factory, with a long history of carpet production, is producing various kinds of hand-woven carpet, machine-woven carpet and others to suit the world trend.
					
					 It is located in Sosong District of Pyongyang.
					
					 Pak Won Chol, director of the factory, said in an interview with KCNA to the following effect:
					
					 The factory is making silk carpet good for health and longevity which the Korean ancestors had long used and wool carpet giving comfortable feeling.
					
					 It produces various patterns and sizes of silk carpet and wool carpet, typical hand-woven carpets, in accordance with the tastes of the customers.
					
					 It also produces on orders hand-woven tapestries reflecting landscapes, figures, animals and so on with some patterns and colors.
					
					 The biggest hand-woven carpet is 20 meters long and 17 meters wide and made with sheep's hair of New Zealand and Australia.
					
					 Patterns and colors of the 4-meter-wide carpet knitted by spool-gripper Axminster carpet loom is very suitable for meeting hall, reception room, bedroom and the like, for which its domestic demand is ever increasing.
					
					 Most of the carpets used by the Pyongyang Koryo Hotel and others at home are the products of the factory.
					
					 Some products are also well received by foreign countries.
					
					 Various countries such as China, Hong Kong and Kazakhstan are proposing trade relations concerning a series of carpet products with it.

articles.title: Composer Living along with Conservatory
articles.content:
Composer Living along with Conservatory
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- There is Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory on the beautiful bank of the River Taedong.
					 Kim (January of 1917-April of 2002) was a composer loved by the people. He devoted all his prominent artistic talent to the music development of the country and the rearing of artiste reserves.
					
					Thanks to the great benevolence of General Secretary Kim Jong Il for conveying long his merits, the conservatory was renamed as Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory in 2006 when its new buildings were constructed and his bust was erected in front of the main building.
					
					 The brilliant history of the Juche-based musical art is associated with the much efforts and merits of the composer who devotedly conducted music composing activities with boundless loyalty to the Party and the leader.
					
					 In the bosom of President Kim Il Sung he brought all his talent and wishes into effect. He composed the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and the national anthem "Patriotic Song".
					
					 Besides, he created many musical pieces of high ideological and artistic value, including "March of Korea" and "March of Democratic Youth" which aroused the army and people to the construction of a new country.
					
					 He distinguished himself to the development of musical art of the country and the bringing up of artiste reserves while working as rector of Pyongyang University of Music and Dance, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Musicians Union, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Musicians Union who was concurrently director of the Phibada Opera Troupe, honorary member of the International Music Council and chairman of the Korean National Music Committee. 
					
					 He, recipient of the Order of Kim Il Sung, Kim Il Sung Prize Winner, Labor Hero and People's Artist, will live long together with the conservatory.

articles.title: Historic Meeting for Turning-point of Great Anti-Japanese War
articles.content:
Historic Meeting for Turning-point of Great Anti-Japanese War
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Today the Korean people are greeting the 69th anniversary of the historic meeting at Xiaohaerbaling. 
					 Entering the 1940s, the Japanese imperialists stepped up the desperate, large-scale "punitive" offensive against the Korean People's Revolutionary Army than ever before while making frantic efforts to spread the flames of war to Southeast Asia in an attempt to realize their wild ambition "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".  
					
					 In those days the Korean people had prepared firm internal forces to fight the final battle against the Japanese imperialists through the energetic anti-Japanese armed struggle under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Meanwhile the Japanese imperialists could not satisfy the demand for combat forces and munitions rapidly growing according to the extended battle front and were faced with strong resistance of the Asian people.
					
					 With a scientific penetration into the general situation, the President convened a meeting of military and political cadres of the KPRA at Xiaohaerbaling, Dunhua County on August 10 and 11, Juche 29 (1940) and delivered a historical report "On Preparing for the Great Event of National Liberation".
					
					 He in the report stressed that full preparations for the final battle should be made to vanquish Japanese imperialism once and for all and thoroughgoing preparations should also be made for founding a revolutionary party, people's government and people's armed forces in the liberated country and for consistently pushing ahead with the revolution.
					
					 He also advanced it as an important strategic task to preserve and accumulate the force of the KPRA, the backbone of the Korean revolution, and train its members to be able political and military cadres and, at the same time, to firmly prepare the people politically and ideologically.
					
					 In order to carry out this task with success, he put forward a new strategic policy on switching over large-unit operations of the KPRA to small-unit actions.
					
					 The KPRA went over from large-unit operations to small-unit actions to give heavy blows to the Japanese imperialists in succession with nimble guerrilla tactics.
					
					 The President wrote in his reminiscences "With the Century" as follows:
					
					The Xiaohaerbaling meeting was a historic meeting that decided to change our strategic line at a new turning point of our revolution, like the Mingyuegou conference in December 1931 and the Nanhutou conference in February 1936 that also set forth important strategic lines for the armed struggle against the Japanese.

articles.title: KCNA Demands Japan Settle Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
KCNA Demands Japan Settle Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Japan is now blatantly challenging the international community demanding it settle the past crimes related to "comfort women".
					 At the 44th meeting of the UN Committee on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women held on July 23, its members demanded Japan honestly apologize for the crimes related to sexual slavery and make reparation for them. But the Japanese delegation tried hard to shun apology, claiming that the Japanese government has already expressed "remorse," adding that the issue had been legally settled.
					
					 How preposterous it is!
					
					 If the issue of "comfort women" is to find a legal settlement, Japan should fully admit the crimes and make apology and reparation for them. 
					
					 But it is keen to keep them buried into oblivion, far from making an honest apology and full reparation for them. 
					
					 All the information about the crimes related to the sexual slavery perpetrated by imperial Japan so far known to the international community is not available through the investigation conducted by Japan itself but was obtained through the testimonies and probes made by its victims, bereaved families of the dead and international organizations. Whenever the above-mentioned crimes were exposed and condemned by parliaments of different countries and international meetings, the Japanese authorities desperately hampered the solution of the issue. 
					
					 The Abe regime went the lengths of totally denying the crimes. 
					
					 How can Japan dare say about a solution and "remorse" as it refuses to admit the most hideous human rights abuse recognized by the world? 
					
					 Japan cites "Murayama's statement" made in 1995 as an example of apology. If this were an honest state apology made by Japan for the crimes related to the sexual slavery, it should have been accompanied by sincere state reparation for them.  
					
					 But Japan was so mean as to project a non-governmental fund for this purpose. It is now creating impression that this fund helped fully settle the above-said issue. This is an intolerable mockery of the victims and the international community. It clearly indicates what extent Japan's spiritual and moral degradation has reached. 
					
					 Conscience represents a mirror showing one's conduct and a barometer distinguishing truth from lies. 
					
					 Conscience is now getting blemished and discarded in Japan just as what happened in the past when it regarded 200,000 Korean women as war supplies and expendables and its Imperial Army committed crimes related to the sexual slavery unprecedented in history in their brutal and despicable nature. 
					
					 That is why Japan is letting loose a spate of lies, far from feeling ashamed of those crimes just as its troops mercilessly violated the dignity, integrity and chastity of so many women of Korea and other Asian countries and killed them.
					
					 The serious and dangerous nature of the issue lies in that Japan is plagued with the same spiritual and moral degradation as that prevailed there in the last century when it turned many parts of Asia into shambles of war and scenes of genocide. 
					
					 History records a lot of wars and not a few countries which earned the ill-fame of being war criminal states. But none of them are so mean and brazen-faced as Japan which has made a mockery of the victims of the monstrous atrocities and their descendents with a wordplay without redeeming its past crimes. Germany, once a fascist state like Japan, and Italy, architect of fascism, turned over a new leaf after settling their inglorious past.
					
					 As seen above, it is only Japan that has an axe to grind, still in the mire of mental and moral degradation.
					
					 Japan is not entitled to talk about conscience unless it has made an honest and adequate apology and reparation for such hideous crime as the sexual slavery. 
					
					Japan will never be able to escape the curse and isolation from the international community if it continues playing sleight of hand, seized with the wicked and brazen-faced disposition inherent to an island country and an anachronistic wild ambition for domination and expansion.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will surely force Japan to pay for all the thrice-cursed crimes related to the sexual slavery committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past.

articles.title: Lee Group's Touted "North-Caused Conflict in S. Korea" Snubbed
articles.content:
Lee Group's Touted "North-Caused Conflict in S. Korea" Snubbed
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- It is preposterous for the Lee Myung Bak group to claim that the "conflict in south Korea" was spawned by the north. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" Its loud-mouthed "conflict in the south" is a natural product of its treacherous policy.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 South Korea is the most unpopular society in which a handful of ruling forces are blocking progress and reforms of society and obstructing its independent development, trampling down upon the will and interests of the absolute majority of the popular masses.
					
					 The contradiction and conflict in the south Korean society are a clear manifestation of the structural contradiction of the corrupt and ailing south Korean society.  They have further festered since the appearance of the pro-U.S. and conservative Lee regime.
					
					 S. Korea is ridden with all social evils; the gap between the rich and the poor, the chronic ailment of the south Korean society, is widening as the days go by due to the unpopular rule of the Lee group and the suicide rate has topped the world's list. 
					
					 The contradiction and conflict in the south Korean society are, at the same time, a product of the Lee group's treacherous policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Lee regime has worked hard to provoke a war against the north while pushing the landmark successes made in the efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations to naught and bringing back the relations back to those in the era of confrontation. It is quite natural that its undisguised confrontation with compatriots and anti-reunification acts are sparking off bitter resentment, protest and denunciation among people from all walks of life in south Korea including the progressive forces who realized the vitality of the June 15 era of reunification in their life experience.
					
					 With no rhetoric can traitor Lee cover up its true colors as the chief criminal who caused serious political contradiction and conflict in the south Korean society or evade its responsibility for the crime.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism Assailed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism Assailed
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are openly contemplating setting up "a general command of ground force" in the Ground "Self-Defence Force" similar to the headquarters of the ground force of the Japanese imperialists which used to be in the period of the Pacific War, while easing the "three principles of arms export". 
					Commenting on this, news analyst of Rodong Sinmun Monday observes:
					
					This move of the Japanese reactionaries can never be in the interests of Japan. It is little short of throwing Japan into the abyss of ruin. 
					
					They insist that this move is aimed at coping with the "threat" of the neighboring countries including the DPRK, but it is nothing but sheer sophism as Tokyo is apt to talk about "threat" from someone. 
					
					 A real threat is coming from Japan, news analyst notes, and goes on: Japan's above-said plan is to round off the SDF organizationally and structurally to get it ready for mounting a "preemptive attack" and carrying out a war.
					
					 Japan has everything in place just as it did in the period of its imperialist rule. This is an indication that Japan's evermore undisguised moves to become a military giant and revive militarism have reached a very grave phase.
					
					 These moves of Japan are rendering the regional situation unstable and increasing the danger of a war.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should not forget that the above-said moves would only throw them into a pitfall of self-destruction. They had better behave themselves if they do not want to perish like tiger moth.

articles.title: Brutal Suppression of Unionists' Strike Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Brutal Suppression of Unionists' Strike Flailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on August 6 to denounce the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' brutal suppression.
					 The statement charged that the Lee group conducted an operation to put down the strike of the Trade Union of Ssangyong Motor Co. by setting in motion a large number of policemen, including the police "commandoes" who caused the tragedy in Ryongsan, and gangsters on August 5.
					
					 Many workers were heavily wounded due to the bestial suppression by the police and gangsters who mercilessly stamped down them with shields and beat them with iron sticks while spraying tear gas from a helicopter, it pointed out.
					
					 It held that the struggle of the said trade union is a just struggle to expose and condemn before the world the unpopular nature of the Lee Myung Bak regime and the brutality of its fascist dictatorial rule.
					
					 The Lee group will have to pay for its brutal suppression, the statement said, stressing that all the people will turn out more vigorously in the struggle against the fascist dictatorship.

articles.title: Struggle for Workers' Right Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Workers' Right Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions released a statement on August 6 at which it said that the struggle to win the right of workers would go on.
					 The statement held that the outbreak of the Ssangyong Motor Co. crisis and its deterioration are attributable to the wrong behavior of the authorities and the business side that shifted the blame for the economic crisis and failure of management onto the workers to dismiss them and were engrossed in a scheme to destroy the trade union while refusing to accept it as a dialogue partner.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group committed such worst inhuman suppression as cutting off the supply of even drinking water, food and medicines to workers of the Ssangyong motor plant in the strike and, in the long run, conducted a murderous operation to quell the strike, it noted, adding: such crime can never be pardoned.
					
					 It declared that the confederation would fight against the Lee Myung Bak regime's unpopular policy and its moves to destroy the labor movement to the last.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Suppression of Government Employees Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Suppression of Government Employees Flayed in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Government Employees' Union for Democracy, the Government Employees' Union and the Court Employees' Union in south Korea on August 7 preferred to the prosecution the minister of Administration and Security and others who are getting hell-bent on the crackdown upon government employees, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 The unions noted that the puppet Ministry of Administration and Security brought to the prosecution charges against sixteen government employees, who participated in the 2nd "All-people Rally" and a meeting protesting against the suppression of those involved in the campaign of issuing declarations on the situation held in the plaza of the Seoul Railway Station on July 19, and instructed the affiliated bodies to severely punish 105 employees.
					
					 They pointed out that it is evidently abuse of power to punish those government employees who took part in such legitimate rally on a rest day.

articles.title: Projected U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Flayed
articles.content:
Projected U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Flayed
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Aug. 3 in denunciation of the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises projected by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique.
					 Saying that the projected exercises are utterly provocative and they are war exercises aimed to destabilize the situation of the Korean Peninsula, the statement scathingly condemned this serious provocation.
					
					 The danger of the exercises lies in the fact that they are to be staged when the confrontation between the U.S. and the DPRK is getting more acute due to the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique's active participation in implementation of the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, the statement pointed out.
					
					 The forthcoming exercises aimed at stifling Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses will never frighten the Korean people, it said, calling upon the progressive people of the world desirous of independence to turn out in the struggle for strengthening solidarity with the Korean people.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory in War Celebrated in Austria
articles.content:
Korean People's Victory in War Celebrated in Austria
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna, Austria, issued bulletin titled "On the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the DPRK's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War" on July 27, the day of the Korean people's victory in the war.
					 Carried in the bulletin was a picture of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The bulletin in an article noted that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces started their armed invasion of the DPRK without declaration of war on June 25, 1950, but the Korean People's Army went over to the decisive counteroffensive under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, liberating vast areas of the southern half of Korea.
					
					 The bulletin cited data to prove that the U.S. imperialists amassed the imperialist allied forces and huge war supplies to the Korean War by usurping the name of the United Nations, turned cities and villages into the ruins with indiscriminate bombing and shelling and inflicted all sorts of misfortune and sufferings on the Korean people and even attempted to use atomic bombs in the war.
					
					 However, the U.S. imperialists could not but sign the Korean Armistice Agreement on July 27, 1953, by the heroic struggle of the army and people of the DPRK, it said.
					
					 The bulletin stressed that the DPRK has developed into a prosperous country where the people enjoy their independent rights to the full and a socialist power based on the Juche idea by repelling foreign forces' pressure under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked in Mexico
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked in Mexico
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea released the 41st issue of its bulletin to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The bulletin carried a photograph of Kim Jong Il and an article titled "Kim Jong Il and His Songun Leadership". 
					
					 August 25, 1960, was the day when Kim Jong Il visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army, the bulletin said, adding:
					
					 His start of Songun leadership provided decisive guarantee for carrying forward the history and tradition of the Songun revolutionary cause in the DPRK from generation to generation.
					
					 It is his steadfast strategy for army building to train the KPA to be a strong army perfect not only in political and ideological aspects but also in terms of military technique.
					
					 At a time when the anti-socialist offensive of the imperialist forces was focused on the DPRK after the collapse of socialism in different countries, he clarified the principle of Songun that the army precisely means a party, state and people and formulated the Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism. 
					
					 In the DPRK the army is not only discharging its mission as defender of the country but also taking the brunt of most important and difficult tasks in socialist economic construction to make breakthrough. The indomitable and noble spirit, displayed by servicepersons in this course, serves as the ideological and moral model to be followed by all the people, it stressed.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in UK
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in UK
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A British preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was formed in London on August 4.
					 Harpal Brar, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Admiration of Officials
articles.content:
Admiration of Officials
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung visited a vegetable greenhouse of a farm in Sonbong County (then) during his field guidance to North Hamgyong Province in late May Juche 70 (1981).
					 To begin with the President acquainted himself with the state of making use of hot water of a thermal power station in vegetable farming.
					
					 Having not completed the project for supplying the hot water of the thermal power plant to the greenhouse, they ensured heat with heavy oil.
					
					 After getting familiar with the state, the President told officials that the construction of the greenhouse was aimed at producing vegetables by using the hot water of the thermal power plant.
					
					 He earnestly instructed officials to wind up the project at an early date and turn out winter vegetables, saying that if the greenhouse was heated with the water of the thermal power plant as it was 120 degrees centigrade, they could cultivate vegetables without a heavy oil boiler.
					
					 Adding that if they wanted to do greenhouse farming, they should do it in a big way, he asked whether there were sites to build more greenhouses.
					
					 Listening to their affirmative reply, he remarked that the land of the greenhouse should be sandy soil because water sinks into the soil well and the soil is not hardened.
					
					 At a moment, the officials were struck by his words.
					
					 Though they had done greenhouse farming for years but did not pay attention to the nature of soil.
					
					 Such being the case, though they carpeted the land with humus soil and manure and applied enough chemical fertilizer every year, the salt density of the soil got high and the soil became hard from after one year or two, with the result that the output decreased gradually.
					
					 In order to do away with such phenomena, they changed the greenhouse soil, but no avail.
					
					 The President gave a scientific solution to the issue of greenhouse soil which even scientists and agro-technicians had not found, thus indicating the way for bringing about a new turn in the greenhouse farming.

articles.title: RPDC observara la reaccion al lanzamiento de satelite surcoreano
articles.content:
RPDC observara la reaccion al lanzamiento de satelite surcoreano
 Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada en relacion con los cables extranjeros de que el Sur de Corea realizara pronto el lanzamiento de satelite, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio el dia 10 como lo siguiente:
					  Segun trascendidos, el Sur de Corea lanzara pronto un satelite mediante la cooperacion tecnica de Rusia.
					
					  Hace 4 meses, los paises participantes en las conversaciones a 6 bandas sometieron el lanzamiento del satelite cientifico de nuestro pais a la discusion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y pusieron en la practica la "sancion" anti-RPDC tras "condenarlo". 
					
					  Como resultado, se elimino el principio de respeto a la soberania e igualdad, que ha sido lo vital y base de las conversaciones a 6 bandas, y esta cita llego a su fin.
					
					  Observaremos si los participantes en las conversaciones a 6 bandas remitiran tambien al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU el lanzamiento de satelite por parte del Sur de Corea.
					
					  La reaccion y la actitud de ellos al respecto volveran a comprobar con toda claridad si existe o se ha eliminado el principio de igualdad.

articles.title: ATCC comenta las acciones bochornosas de Japon
articles.content:
ATCC comenta las acciones bochornosas de Japon
  Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ATCC) -- Japon desafia frontalmente a la demanda de la sociedad internacional de liquidar el crimen del siglo pasado relacionado con las "consoladoras sexuales" del viejo ejercito japones.
					  En la 44a sesion del Comite sobre la Eliminacion de Todas las Formas de Discriminacion contra Mujer de la ONU, los miembros demandaron a Japon pedir disculpas con sinceridad por ese crimen y recompensarlo.
					
					  Pero, la delegacion japonesa se mostro evasiva arguyendo que su gobierno ha expresado el "remordimiento de la conciencia" y se atrevio a chismear que el problema en cuestion ya fue solucionado en el orden juridico.
					
					  Son palabras sumamente absurdas.
					
					  A fin de resolver de manera legal el caso de las ex "consoladoras sexuales", es preciso que Japon reconozca, se disculpe e indemnice por el respecto en lo suficiente.
					
					  Pero, al contrario, Japon esta tratando de dejar ese caso en el olvido de la historia.
					
					  Todos los datos sobre el caso se dieron a conocer hasta la fecha en la sociedad internacional no por la investigacion propia de Japon sino por las declaraciones y averiguaciones de las victimas, sus familiares y organizaciones internacionales.
					
					  Historicamente, ese pais isleno ha venido obstaculizando obstinadamente la discusion del "problema de consoladoras" en los parlamentos de varios paises y las reuniones internacionales que terminaron condenandolo.
					
					  En el regimen de Abe el descaro llego a tal punto que se negaba a reconocer ese peor crimen de violacion de DDHH, que esta al conocimiento del mundo.
					
					Entonces como Japon puede hablar de la supuesta solucion y el "remordimiento de la conciencia"?
					
					  Si la "declaracion de Murayama" de 1995, que cita Japon como antecedente de su excusa, fuera la verdadera del Estado, este pais debio hacer la debida indemnizacion estatal a las victimas de ese sonado caso. 
					
					  Pero, Japon involucro en este tema a un fondo civil y trata de enganar a la opinion publica como si con esto haya solucionado el problema.
					
					  Esto deviene intolerable burla a las danadas y la sociedad internacional y muestra claramente a que punto ha llegado la degeneracion psiquico-moral de Japon.
					
					  La conciencia deviene el espejo de la accion y la norma que divide la falsedad y la verdad.
					
					  La conciencia de Japon esta tan enturbiada como cuando convirtio a 200 mil coreanas en las esclavas sexuales considerandolas como material belico.
					
					  La crueldad y la suciedad, con que se cometio este crimen, no tienen precedentes en la historia.
					
					  Japon no se siente avergonzado sino se dedica a mentir como aquel tiempo cuando violaba cruelmente la dignidad, el honor y la virginidad de numerosas mujeres de Corea y del resto de Asia y las asesinaba cociendo.
					
					  Lo grave y peligroso del problema es que Japon esta en la misma condicion psiquico-moral del siglo pasado cuando escenificaba los banos de sangre mediante la guerra y la masacre.
					
					  En la historia se registraron muchas guerras y no fueron pocos los que sufrieron la afrenta del pais derrotado en la guerra.
					
					  Pero, ninguno fue tan sucio y descarado como Japon que no liquida su historia criminal y burla con hablillas a los danados de ensangrentadas barbaridades y sus descendientes.
					
					  Ayer, Alemania, que fue otro Estado fascista como Japon, comenzo de nuevo separandose de su ignominioso pasado y lo hizo hoy Italia que fue la cuna del fascismo.
					
					  Entre estos tres paises, que en la primera mitad del siglo pasado, habian inquietado el mundo con el oleaje del fascismo, Japon es el unico que suena con otra cosa divagando en la deformacion psiquico-moral.
					
					  Antes de que Japon reconozca con sinceridad su vergonzoso pasado incluyendo el crimen "consoladoras sexuales", pida disculpas en terminos claros y lo indemnice, el no podra hablar nunca de la conciencia.
					
					  Si Japon sigue recurriendo a las artimanas sin dejar los vicios de mezquino y descarado pais isleno y cautivado con la anacronica ambicion dominacionista y expansionista, no sera liberado jamas de las maldiciones y aislamiento en la arena internacional.  
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea saldaran estricta cuenta de ese escalofriante crimen de los imperialistas japoneses.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela la causa de males sociales del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela la causa de males sociales del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ATCC) -- Al igual que el ladron que quiere golpear a su victima, la pandilla de Lee Myung Bak habla tanto de las "discrepancias entre las personas", causadas supuestamente por el Norte de Corea, si bien ellas son producto inevitable de las politicas vendepatrias de si misma.
					Asi revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					El Sur de Corea es la sociedad mas antipopular donde un punado de las fuerzas dominantes frena el progreso, la reforma y el desarrollo independiente de la sociedad pisoteando la voluntad e intereses de la abrumadora mayoria de masas populares.
					
					El antagonismo y la discrepancia son la muestra coherente de las contradicciones estructurales de la corrupta sociedad surcoreana y se agudizan hoy cada vez mas desde la aparicion del "poder" proyanqui y conservador de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					Las infames politicas antipopulares de la banda de Lee empeoraron los males sociales de toda indole.
					
					Por ejemplo, se agrava el mal cronico de la sociedad surcoreana: "los ricos se hacen cada vez mas ricos y los pobres cada vez mas pobres", mientras se establecio el record mundial en la tasa de suicidas.
					
					El antagonismo y las discrepancias de la sociedad surcoreana son tambien el producto de la antinacional politica de confrontacion fratricida de la banda de Lee, que elimino los exitos de capital importancia para el desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas y trata de desatar la guerra contra el Norte tras darles marcha atras a estos vinculos a la era de conflictos.
					
					Esta muy claro que esta abierta campana en pro de la confrontacion intercoreana y en contra de la reunificacion provocara la resistencia rotunda y protestas de las fuerzas progresistas y otros habitantes de diferentes sectores que han probado en la realidad la vitalidad de la era de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio.
					
					Por muy elocuente que fuera la banda de Lee,  no podra ocultar su fachada de culpable principal del agudo antagonismo politico de la sociedad surcoreana ni eludir la responsabilidad por esto.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia intento de Japon de resucitar militarismo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia intento de Japon de resucitar militarismo
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ATCC) -- En estos tiempos, los reaccionarios japoneses aflojan la normativa de los "tres principios de importacion de armas" por una parte y, por la otra, revelan abiertamente su intencion de instalar dentro de las "Fuerzas Terrestres de Autodefensa" el "Comando General" de las mismas que cumplira la misma funcion del Estado Mayor de las Fuerzas Terrestres del viejo ejercito japones durante la Guerra del Pacifico. 
					En un comentario individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun advierte que tales maniobras no seran utiles en ningun caso a Japon y al contrario, lo ponen en el peligro de arruinamiento.
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses justifican su conducta con la destenida y socorrida sofisteria de "hacer frente a la supuesta amenaza de Corea y otros paises vecinos", adelanta el comentario y prosigue:
					
					Pero, la amenaza proviene realmente de Japon.
					
					El objetivo de la instalacion del nuevo "Comando General" en las "Fuerzas Terrestres de Autodefensa" es perfeccionar el sistema estructural de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" en lo conveniente al "ataque preventivo" y a la guerra. 
					
					Para este fin, Japon esta restituyendo su aspecto durante la era imperial del pasado.
					
					Este hecho muestra que llegan a la fase cada dia mas abierta y grave las maniobras de Japon encaminadas a convertirse en una potencia militar y rehabilitar el militarismo.
					
					  Estas acciones criminales desestabilizan la situacion regional y agrandan el peligro de guerra. 
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses deben actuar con prudencia al darse clara cuenta de que seran arruinados si siguen portandose como ahora.
